name: FlyxWeb
author: flyx@flyxnodes.com
description: Professional web hosting solution with support for multiple frameworks, WordPress, SQLite3, and MySQL.
startup:
#!/bin/bash
if [[ "${DEBUG}" == "1" ]]; then
    set -x
fi

# Database initialization if enabled
if [[ "${DB_ENGINE}" == "mysql" && "${DB_AUTO_SETUP}" == "1" ]]; then
    echo "[FlyxWeb] Initializing MySQL..."
    service mysql start
    mysql -e "CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS ${DB_NAME};"
    mysql -e "CREATE USER IF NOT EXISTS '${DB_USER}'@'localhost' IDENTIFIED BY '${DB_PASS}';"
    mysql -e "GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON ${DB_NAME}.* TO '${DB_USER}'@'localhost';"
    mysql -e "FLUSH PRIVILEGES;"
fi

# Handle specific software configurations
case "${SOFTWARE}" in
    "WordPress")
        echo "[FlyxWeb] Setting up WordPress environment..."
        cd "${WEBROOT}"
        if [[ ! -f "wp-config.php" && "${WP_AUTO_INSTALL}" == "1" ]]; then
            wp core download --allow-root
            if [[ "${DB_ENGINE}" == "mysql" ]]; then
                wp config create --dbname=${DB_NAME} --dbuser=${DB_USER} --dbpass=${DB_PASS} --allow-root
                wp core install --url=${DOMAIN} --title="${WP_TITLE}" --admin_user=${WP_ADMIN} --admin_password=${WP_ADMIN_PASS} --admin_email=${WP_ADMIN_EMAIL} --allow-root
            elif [[ "${DB_ENGINE}" == "sqlite" ]]; then
                wp config create --dbname=wordpress --dbtype=sqlite --allow-root
                wp core install --url=${DOMAIN} --title="${WP_TITLE}" --admin_user=${WP_ADMIN} --admin_password=${WP_ADMIN_PASS} --admin_email=${WP_ADMIN_EMAIL} --allow-root
            fi
        fi
        php-fpm &
        ;;  
    "php"*)
        echo "[FlyxWeb] Starting PHP server..."
        cd "${WEBROOT}"
        php-fpm &
        ;;
    "dotnet"*)
        echo "[FlyxWeb] Starting .NET application..."
        cd "${WEBROOT}"
        if [[ -n "${DOTNET_DLL}" ]]; then
            dotnet "${DOTNET_DLL}"
        else
            dotnet run --urls=http://0.0.0.0:8080
        fi
        exit 0
        ;;
    "python")
        echo "[FlyxWeb] Starting Python application..."
        cd "${WEBROOT}"
        if [[ -f "requirements.txt" ]]; then
            pip install -r requirements.txt
        fi
        if [[ -f "app.py" ]]; then
            python app.py
        elif [[ -f "main.py" ]]; then
            python main.py
        else
            python -m http.server 8080
        fi
        exit 0
        ;;
    "NextJS")
        echo "[FlyxWeb] Starting NextJS application..."
        cd "${WEBROOT}"
        npm install
        npm run build
        npm run start
        exit 0
        ;;
    "Astro")
        echo "[FlyxWeb] Starting Astro application..."
        cd "${WEBROOT}"
        npm install
        npm run build
        npm run preview -- --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8080
        exit 0
        ;;
    "vercel-serve")
        echo "[FlyxWeb] Starting Vercel/Serve..."
        cd "${WEBROOT}"
        npx serve -s -l 8080
        exit 0
        ;;
    "custom")
        echo "[FlyxWeb] Running custom command: ${CUSTOM_COMMAND}"
        cd "${WEBROOT}"
        eval "${CUSTOM_COMMAND}"
        exit 0
        ;;
    *)
        echo "[FlyxWeb] Software '${SOFTWARE}' not recognized, defaulting to PHP"
        cd "${WEBROOT}"
        php -S 0.0.0.0:8080
        exit 0
        ;;
esac

# Configure Nginx based on domain settings
if [[ "${DOMAIN_MODE}" == "multi" && -n "${DOMAIN}" ]]; then
    echo "[FlyxWeb] Setting up multi-domain configuration..."
    IFS=',' read -ra DOMAIN_LIST <<< "${DOMAIN}"
    for domain in "${DOMAIN_LIST[@]}"; do
        domain=$(echo "${domain}" | xargs)
        mkdir -p "${WEBROOT}/${domain}"
        cat > /etc/nginx/conf.d/${domain}.conf << EOL
server {
    listen 8080;
    server_name ${domain};
    root ${WEBROOT}/${domain};
    index index.php index.html index.htm;
    
    location / {
        try_files \$uri \$uri/ /index.php?\$query_string;
    }
    
    location ~ \.php$ {
        include fastcgi_params;
        fastcgi_pass unix:/var/run/php-fpm.sock;
        fastcgi_param SCRIPT_FILENAME \$document_root\$fastcgi_script_name;
    }
}
EOL
    done
else
    echo "[FlyxWeb] Setting up single domain configuration..."
    cat > /etc/nginx/conf.d/default.conf << EOL
server {
    listen 8080;
    server_name _;
    root ${WEBROOT};
    index index.php index.html index.htm;
    
    location / {
        try_files \$uri \$uri/ /index.php?\$query_string;
    }
    
    location ~ \.php$ {
        include fastcgi_params;
        fastcgi_pass unix:/var/run/php-fpm.sock;
        fastcgi_param SCRIPT_FILENAME \$document_root\$fastcgi_script_name;
    }
}
EOL
fi

echo "[FlyxWeb] Starting nginx..."
nginx -g "daemon off;"

variables.name: Website Root Directory

variables.name: Database Engine

variables.name: Database Password

variables.name: WordPress Site Title
variables.description: Title for your WordPress site during auto-installation.

variables.name: WordPress Admin Username

variables.name: WordPress Admin Email
